DOC.brief_summary: This study design multi-centre , randomise , parallel-group , placebo-controlled , phase III confirmatory study . The study partially double-blinded : comparison Group 1 ( placebo group ) Group 2 ( ICI35,868 without EES0000645/A ) carry double-blind , comparison Group 1 ( placebo group ) Group 3 ( ICI35,868 EES0000645/A ) carry single-blind . The efficacy safety ICI35,868 without EES0000645/A sedation moderate diagnostic gastrointestinal endoscopy gastrointestinal endoscopic polypectomy evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Study ICI35,868 ( Diprivan ) With Without EES0000645/A ( SDS ) Gastrointestinal Endoscopy
DOC.criteria: 1.Provision write informed consent prior studyrelated procedures/examinations 2.Aged 20 year old 3.Subjects plan undergo nonemergent EGD colonoscopy , include gastrointestinal endoscopic polypectomy shall complete within 1 hour ( exclude endoscopic submucosal dissection ultrasonic endoscope , pernasal endoscope , etc. ) . 1. involvement planning and/or conduct study ( apply sponsor 's employee and/or staff study site ) 2 . Subjects underwent endoscopic procedure ICI35,868 ( propofol ) administration within 1 year . 3 . Participation another clinical study investigational product within 4 week prior randomisation . 4 . Baseline ( Visit 1 ) blood oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) < 90 % ( room air ) 5 . ASA III , IV , V VI ; Subject serious disease cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , liver , pancreatic endocrine function .
